doc:
Steven Martini https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Martini 0 Steven Martini is a writer, actor, composer, editor, and singer/songwriter. His first break was as Cadet Alex J. Stone in Major Payne. He and his brother Derick Martini wrote the films Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire and Lymelife. Based on experiences from the Martinis' childhood, Lymelife won the FIPRESCI award at the 2008 Toronto International Film Festival, and premiered at the 2009 Sundance Film Festival. Martini is also known for being the singer/songwriter for the Los Angeles-based band The Spaceship Martini. Steven_Martini is a_writer , actor , composer , editor , and singer/songwriter . His_first_break was as Cadet_Alex_J._Stone in Major_Payne . He and his_brother_Derick_Martini wrote the_films Smiling Fish_and_Goat on Fire_and_Lymelife . Based on experiences from the_Martinis '_childhood , Lymelife won the_FIPRESCI_award at the_2008_Toronto_International_Film_Festival , and premiered at the_2009_Sundance_Film_Festival . Martini is_also_known for being the_singer/songwriter for the_Los_Angeles-based_band The_Spaceship_Martini .
